alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 2:04PM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, briefly over southern portions of the county this afternoon, then again later tonight. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
